price: ߊ߲ ߞߵߏ߬ ߟߎ߬ ߞߟߏ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߸ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߦߟߍ߬ߒ߬ߞߊ߲߬ߕߊ ߦߴߏ߬ ߟߎ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߘߏ߫ ߘߊߥߎ߲߫ ߠߴߊ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߝߣߊ߫
arabic: وَذَلَّلۡنَٰهَا لَهُمۡ فَمِنۡهَا رَكُوبُهُمۡ وَمِنۡهَا يَأۡكُلُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wadhallalnāhā lahum famin'hā rakūbuhum wamin'hā yakulūna
